PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12442024-11-22NRC, ISED
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectNRC and RCEA - Computer Systems Group ** COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT **
PrecisOrder approving the ENTRY by National Research Council of Canada into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Research Council Employees’ Association that covers all employees in the COMPUTER SYSTEMS Administration (CS) Group bargaining unit, for the period beginning on January 1, 2022 and ending on December 31, 2025.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving the ENTRY by National Research Council of Canada into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Research Council Employees’ Association that covers all employees in the COMPUTER SYSTEMS Administration (CS) Group bargaining unit, for the period beginning on January 1, 2022 and ending on December 31, 2025.
